description: This file defines a React component named Procedures that handles CRUD operations for procedures, including file uploads and downloads, within an inventory management web application. It manages UI states, fetches and displays data from an API, and provides modal-based input forms.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fetches procedures data from the API and populates the rows state. Uses try-catch to handle errors with default data.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Constructs a form data payload with procedure info and file, then posts it to the API to create a new procedure. Resets form states and reloads data afterward.
